mapper.sql: id, uuid, name, info, device_id, update_time
mapper.select: select r.id as map_id,r.device_id,r.name as map_name,r.uuid,t.name as device_name from (select * from tb_maps where device_id in (select device_id from tb_customer_device where customer_id in(select customer_id from tb_user where id=#{userId}))) r join tb_device_info t on r.device_id=t.id

select r.id as map_id,r.device_id,r.name as map_name,r.uuid,t.name as device_name from (select * from tb_maps where device_id in (select device_id from tb_customer_device where customer_id in(select customer_id from tb_user where id=${userId}))) r join tb_device_info t on r.device_id=t.id ${mapsParams}

select r.id as map_id,r.device_id,r.name as map_name,r.uuid,t.name as device_name from (select * from tb_maps where device_id in (select device_id from tb_customer_device where customer_id in(select id from tb_customer))) r join tb_device_info t on r.device_id=t.id

select r.id as map_id,r.device_id,r.name as map_name,r.uuid,t.name as device_name from (select * from tb_maps where device_id in (select device_id from tb_customer_device where customer_id in(select id from tb_customer))) r join tb_device_info t on r.device_id=t.id ${mapsParams}
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_maps
id,
uuid,
name,
info,
device_id,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update:
update tb_maps
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_maps set uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
